text: Need Daniel Martinez for Bed Bath N' Table campaign. Budget around $2,516, looking for 3 x 30-second Instagram reel, 1 x Pinterest pin, 1 x Event photography, 1 x 30-second Instagram reel, 3 x Facebook post. 6 week exclusivity from other similar brands. Campaign runs December 2025. Usage rights for 6 months. Engagement period: 4 months.
